statements: DELETE FROM MarineSediments WHERE ResearcherID = 1001 AND PollutantType = 'Oil';
DELETE FROM MarineSediments WHERE SedimentLocation = 'Pacific Ocean' AND HabitatType = 'Reef';
DELETE FROM MarineSediments WHERE ResearcherID = 123 AND SedimentLocation = 'North Sea';
DELETE FROM MarineSediments WHERE HabitatType LIKE '%coral reef%' AND PollutantConcentration > 100.00;
DELETE FROM marine_sediments WHERE habitat_name = 'Deep Sea' AND pollutant_type = 'Oil';
DELETE FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
